bio.name: Christopher Barrow
bio.title: Polyglot Professional
bio.tagline: I have held many positions in my career, but at their core there has been a single constant: a passion to think differently.
bio.par1: It has been suggested in more than one tech circle that skill sets such as entrepreneurship, innovation and disruption can only be cultivated in start-ups; free from the bureaucratic processes of large traditional organizations. These are not skill sets. They are a mind set. They come from the soul. They are a result of one's passion to think outside of what is considered to be rationale or safe.
bio.par2: Passion is what allows me to think differently regardless of my working environment. Passion enables me to embrace change. Passion drives me to take risks, learn from my failures, and lead by example.

positions.title: Solutions Delivery Manager, .NET Solutions Delivery Centre (SDC)
positions.par1: Manager of a nearly 70 strong development team for the Solutions Delivery Office, .NET SDC.
positions.par2: Using agile and human centred design methodologies, coupled with collaborative partnerships, the solutions delivery office within the .NET SDC delivers products and services that enable the legislative mandates of our ministry, and cluster clients.
positions.par3: We provide effective, efficient and usable solutions while pursuing innovative, disruptive solutions and iterative improvements
